mapper.select: SELECT t3.ID_, t1.TYPE_ AS TYPE, t1.TIME_ AS TIME, t1.USER_ID_ AS userId, t2.FIRST_ AS userName, t3.TASK_ID_ AS taskId, t1.PROC_INST_ID_ AS processInstanceId, t1.MESSAGE_ AS message, CONVERT (FULL_MSG_ USING utf8) AS fullMsg, t3.`ACT_NAME_` AS taskName, t3.`START_TIME_` AS startTime, t3.`END_TIME_` AS endTime, t3.`DURATION_` AS duration, t3.ACT_ID_ AS actId FROM `act_hi_actinst` AS t3 LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM act_hi_comment a WHERE a.ACTION_='AddComment') t1 ON ( t1.`TASK_ID_` = t3.`TASK_ID_` ) LEFT JOIN act_id_user t2 ON t1.USER_ID_ = t2.ID_ WHERE t3.`PROC_INST_ID_` = #{value} AND t3.ACT_TYPE_='userTask' ORDER BY t3.START_TIME_ ASC
SELECT ID_ FROM `act_hi_taskinst` t1 WHERE t1.PROC_INST_ID_ =#{value} AND t1.DURATION_ IS NOT NULL
